job.title: Principal Software Engineer
job.description: pJob Summary ppbr ppWhistic is growing and were looking for an exceptional Principal Software Engineer to maintain and upgrade all existing software The Principal Software Engineers responsibilities include recommending adjustments to resolve software issues improving the functionality of existing software and ensuring that the design application and maintenance of software meets the quality standards of the company You should also be able to mentor guide and train other engineers ppbr ppTo be successful as a Principal Software Engineer you should be able to evaluate the users needs time limitations and system limitations when developing software A standout Principal Software Engineer is one who is up to date on new technologies and software development practices ppbr ppKey Responsibilities nbsp ppnbsp pullipDesigning coding and debugging software plilipImproving the performance of existing software plilipProviding training to other engineers plilipMaintaining and upgrading existing software plilipRecommending new technologies that can help increase productivity plilipSupervising and overseeing the technical aspects of projects plilipInvestigating softwarerelated complaints and making necessary adjustments to ensure optimal software performance plilipRegularly attending team meetings to discuss projects brainstorm ideas and put forward solutions to any issues pliulullipSupport and develop peer engineers by providing advice coaching and mentorship opportunities pliulpnbsp ppTech Qualifications ppbr pullipJava 8 Spring Boot 15 Spring Data REST Angular Javascript JSON XML Jenkins SQL plilipEnterprise Systems microServices SaaS plilipAWS preferred pliulpbr ppOther Skills and Qualifications pbrullipBachelors degree in computer engineeringcomputer science or related field plilipStrong analytical skills plilipGood communication skills plilipExcellent organizational and leadership skills plilipProven experience in highlevel programming languages like Java plilipProven experience in software development methodologies plilipProven experience building complex web systems plilipThe ability to multitask pliulpbr ppBenefits ppbr pullipStock options plilipMedical dental and vision insurance benefit plilipPaid parental leave plilip401K plilipCompetitive salary and bonus plilip16 Paid Holidays plilip15 Days PTO plilip2 Whistic DNA Days plilipSummer Fridays pliulpnbsp ppAbout Whistic ppbr ppWhistic is on a mission to become the single source of trust for buyers and sellers by enabling companies to hold each other accountable for protecting their shared data Heres how it works When a company is seeking out a vendor that will have access to its sensitive data that company must assess the vendor to ensure it meets certain information security thresholds This assessment process results in cumbersome clunky and slow spreadsheets emailed back and forth back and fortheating up info security resources and ultimately delaying deals ppnbsp ppThats where Whistic comes in Our gamechanging 2sided platform enables security and sales teams to proactively conduct and respond to third party security assessments by streamlining and automating the process transforming the work for companies all over the world ppemnbspem ppemWhistic is an Equal Opportunity Employeremp
